name: Jaygasi_Extensions_SimpleInteractivePDFViewer
label: Simple Interactive PDF Viewer
description: Minimal PDF viewer with highlight overlays for Pega.

properties.name: highlightParentProp
properties.label: Highlight Parent Page Property
properties.description: Pega property for the parent page containing pxResults. Example: .myPage

properties.name: height
properties.label: Viewer Height
properties.description: Specify the height of the PDF viewer (e.g., 600px or 80vh).

properties.name: debug
properties.label: Enable Debug Logging
properties.description: If enabled, logs details about highlightParentProp and overlays to the browser console.
